data.title: The Geometry Of Newton’s Cradle
data.meta_description: A geometric approach to the multi-impact problem of perfect collisions in finite freedom dynamics is presented. The set of all admissible post-impact velocities at an impact is derived from kinematic, kinetic and energetic compatibility conditions. Impact events are...
